author: lutuck
body:
PR description:
This PR adds DQM plots using unconstrained pT and dxy. These plots will be useful for monitoring now that the neural network is working at P5.

This is a backport of [#42155](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42155)

PR validation:
Validated by `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos` and everything looks good.

If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for: @eyigitba
title: [13_2_X] EMTF add DQM plots for unconstrained pT and dxy
